stories.title: Love, Virtually - Episode 1
stories.storyDescription: Can two competing players in the world of online gaming overcome obstacles, both real and virtually, and come together?

author.bio: Jonathan Rosen is a transplanted New Yorker, who now lives with his family in sunny, South Florida. He's been writing ever since he was a little kid, but it's much more legible now.
